ComicInfo.Summary:
When a right wing paramilitary group bombs the A.T.F. offices, Gilad and his girlfriend are caught in the blast. To track down these homegrown fanatics, Gilad will assume his long unused cover identity as right reactionary militia legend- Gil Masters!
1995 books with a UPC code may exist as "Newsstand Sales" in addition to "Direct Sales".
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/eternal-warrior-43-armed-militia/4000-41585/
